title: The default value in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: When modifying the default value in the list box of a report parameter, the previously set default value is lost. Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc" and set "aa" as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value from "aa" to "aaa" directly and click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc", and set "aa" as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value from "aa" to "aaa" and click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
